snippet: The Supreme Court lets an appeals court decision against Chevron stand.
abstract: The Supreme Court lets an appeals court decision against Chevron stand.
lead_paragraph: Chevron has lost its bid to have the Supreme Court block the collection of mammoth legal penalties against the company related to three decades of pollution in Ecuador. The damages assessed against Chevron now total $19 billion, making the Ecuadorian judgment the largest of its kind in history.

headline.main: Chevron Is Rebuffed on Damages in Ecuador
